metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19921 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: runc through 1.0.0-rc9 has Incorrect Access Control leading to Escalation of Privileges, related to libcontainer/rootfs_linux.go. To exploit this, an attacker must be able to spawn two containers with custom volume-mount configurations, and be able to run custom images. (This vulnerability does not affect Docker due to an implementation detail that happens to block the attack.)

criterions.comment: runc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
